alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 1:57AM MST until August 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected along Alamo Road and Signal Road in southern Mohave County. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 315 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 157 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Mohave County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
